item.title: Map Generation Project
item.author: JosepheHowarth@gmail.com (Joe Howarth)
item.description: Map Generation Project By Joe Howarth Purpose This project seeks to procedurally create plausible geography and display it as a map. The generator will be used for creating the starting conditions in a historical population dynamics simulation. How to Run npm i npm run serve Methodology Unlike many map and terrain generators, this project does not use noise as the fundamental building block. Instead, it uses a Delaunay triangulation over semi-random points, then combines elevations from several hill, mountain, basin and slope functions.
